CourseOfferingParticipant.name: CourseOfferingParticipant
CourseOfferingParticipant.description: Represents information about a student's enrollment in a Course Offering.

AcademicTermEnrollmentId.description: The Academic Term associated with the Course Offering Participant.

CourseOfferingId.description: The Course Offering associated with the Course Offering Participant.

DroppedDateTime.description: The date and time when the student registered for the course.

EndDate.description: The date when the participant's involvement in the course ended.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

IsRepeatAttempt.description: Indicates whether the participant has previously taken the course (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

ParticipantAccountId.description: The Account associated with the Course Offering Participant.

ParticipantAffiliation.description: The participant's role in the course.

ParticipantContactId.description: The Contact record associated with the Course Offering Participant.

ParticipationStatus.description: Specifies the participation status of the participant in the course.

RegistrationDateTime.description: The date and time when the student removed the course from the registration.

StartDate.description: The date when the participant's involvement in the course began.

Summary.description: The summary associated with the Course Offering Participant.
